signature: Predicate<T> allPredicate(Collection<? extends Predicate<? super T>>)

direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle predicate collections with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods process collections of predicates and perform validation.
Both methods involve coercing predicates, though for different purposes.
Both methods handle cases where no predicates are provided, returning a true predicate.

enhanced_by.reason: Validation of predicates is required before creating the allPredicate.
Coercing predicates is necessary before returning them in the allPredicate method.
The test method is used to verify the behavior of the predicates returned by allPredicate.
